title: Crazy Mofo Gaming LF Top Laner
body:
Hey Guys 

I am the leader of Crazy Mofo Gaming. we are a new team what has been formed and play pretty much everyday unless something comes up. at the moment we still finalizing our rostor but is currently silver 3 and rising. we are a team filled with mostly plats but some high golds as well. we are looking for a serious, active top laner who can hold his own and help out the team when needed and be able to put on pressure in other lanes. we need a guy who will communicate with the team and not rage and have fun even when losing but also learning on the mistakes we are doing.

What we are looking for:
Must Have mic and be able to use Skype
Must be active and serious 
have good knowledge of the game
We are looking for gold 1 ++ 

If you are interested feel free to add elfdonald in game or leave a comment and ill get back to you when i can.

replies.body:
Hey guys, so nice to see OCE's Summoners being ambitious.
If you're ready for a challenge, head over to [veileague.wordpress.com](http://veileague.wordpress.com) for a chance to test your skills and win $300.
